watching.description: Show posts in unread and recent
not-watching.description: Do not show posts in unread, show in recent
ignoring.description: Do not show posts in unread and recent
watching.message: You are now watching updates from this community and all subcommunities

ignoring.message: You are now ignoring updates from this community and all subcommunities
